public string NameDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Extensions for IList{T}</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class ListExtDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary> Sorts an IList{T} in place. </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Sort<T>(this IList<T> list, Comparison<T> comparison)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ArrayList.Adapter((IList)list).Sort(new ComparisonDelegator<T>(comparison));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Provides a mechanism for easily converting a Comparison<> delegate (or lambda) to an IComparer<>.Di2015NewLine    /// This can be used for List.BinarySearch(), for example.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The type of items to be compared.</typeparam>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public sealed class ComparisonDelegator<T>: IComparer<T>, IComparerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Create from a Comparison<> delegate.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="comparison">A Comparison<> delegate.</param>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ComparisonDelegator(Comparison<T> comparison)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this._comparison = comparison;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Implements the IComparer.Compare() method.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _comparison(x, y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Implements the IComparer.Compare() method.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Compare(object x, object y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _comparison((T)x, (T)y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Used to store the Comparison delegate.</summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly Comparison<T> _comparison;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Special class to sort strings "naturally", Di2015NewLine    /// but to place non-numeric items *before* numeric items.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class AlphanumComparator : IComparerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private enum ChunkType {Alphanumeric, Numeric};Di2015NewLine        private bool InChunk(char ch, char otherCh)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ChunkType type = ChunkType.Alphanumeric;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (char.IsDigit(otherCh))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                type = ChunkType.Numeric;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((type == ChunkType.Alphanumeric && char.IsDigit(ch))Di2015NewLine                || (type == ChunkType.Numeric && !char.IsDigit(ch)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Compare(object x, object y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String s1 = x as string;Di2015NewLine            String s2 = y as string;Di2015NewLine            if (s1 == null || s2 == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int thisMarker = 0, thisNumericChunk = 0;Di2015NewLine            int thatMarker = 0, thatNumericChunk = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((thisMarker < s1.Length) || (thatMarker < s2.Length))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (thisMarker >= s1.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return -1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (thatMarker >= s2.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                char thisCh = s1[thisMarker];Di2015NewLine                char thatCh = s2[thatMarker];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                StringBuilder thisChunk = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder thatChunk = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while ((thisMarker < s1.Length) && (thisChunk.Length==0 ||InChunk(thisCh, thisChunk[0])))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    thisChunk.Append(thisCh);Di2015NewLine                    thisMarker++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (thisMarker < s1.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        thisCh = s1[thisMarker];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while ((thatMarker < s2.Length) && (thatChunk.Length==0 ||InChunk(thatCh, thatChunk[0])))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    thatChunk.Append(thatCh);Di2015NewLine                    thatMarker++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (thatMarker < s2.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        thatCh = s2[thatMarker];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int result = 0;Di2015NewLine                // If both chunks contain numeric characters, sort them numericallyDi2015NewLine                if (char.IsDigit(thisChunk[0]) && char.IsDigit(thatChunk[0]))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    thisNumericChunk = Convert.ToInt32(thisChunk.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    thatNumericChunk = Convert.ToInt32(thatChunk.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (thisNumericChunk < thatNumericChunk)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        result = -1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (thisNumericChunk > thatNumericChunk)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        result = 1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (char.IsDigit(thisChunk[0]) && !char.IsDigit(thatChunk[0]))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return 1; // Ensure that non-numeric sorts before numeric.Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (!char.IsDigit(thisChunk[0]) && char.IsDigit(thatChunk[0]))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return -1;  // Ensure that non-numeric sorts before numeric.Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = thisChunk.ToString().CompareTo(thatChunk.ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14558908Di2015UniqueSeparator Create Procedure SSISDetailsDi2015NewLine as Di2015NewLine beginDi2015NewLine with ChildFoldersDi2015NewLine asDi2015NewLine (Di2015NewLine   select PARENT.parentfolderid, PARENT.folderid, PARENT.foldername,Di2015NewLine    cast('' as sysname) as RootFolder,Di2015NewLine    cast(PARENT.foldername as varchar(max)) as FullPath,Di2015NewLine    0 as LvlDi2015NewLine   from msdb.dbo.sysssispackagefolders PARENTDi2015NewLine   where PARENT.parentfolderid is nullDi2015NewLine   UNION ALLDi2015NewLine   select CHILD.parentfolderid, CHILD.folderid, CHILD.foldername,Di2015NewLine   case ChildFolders.LvlDi2015NewLine        when 0 then CHILD.foldernameDi2015NewLine        else ChildFolders.RootFolderDi2015NewLine    end as RootFolder,Di2015NewLine    cast(ChildFolders.FullPath + '/' + CHILD.foldername as varchar(max))Di2015NewLine        as FullPath,Di2015NewLine    ChildFolders.Lvl + 1 as LvlDi2015NewLine   from msdb.dbo.sysssispackagefolders CHILDDi2015NewLine   inner join ChildFolders on ChildFolders.folderid = CHILD.parentfolderidDi2015NewLine   )Di2015NewLine   select F.RootFolder, F.FullPath, P.name as PackageName,Di2015NewLine   P.description as PackageDescription, P.packageformat, P.packagetype,Di2015NewLine   P.vermajor, P.verminor, P.verbuild, P.vercomments,Di2015NewLine   cast(cast(P.packagedata as varbinary(max)) as xml) as PackageDataDi2015NewLine   from ChildFolders FDi2015NewLine   inner join msdb.dbo.sysssispackages P on P.folderid = F.folderidDi2015NewLine   order by F.FullPath asc, P.name asc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLine

14559314Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class DateTimeComparer : IEqualityComparer<DateTime>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(DateTime x, DateTime y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetHashCode(x) == GetHashCode(y);  Di2015NewLine        // In general, this shouldn't be written (because GetHashCode(x) can equal GetHashCode(y) even if x != y (with the given  comparer)). 14571965Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Enter Morse Code: ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string morseInput = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(morseInput))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Empty or consists only of white-space charactersDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        morseInput = morseInput.Replace(" ", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool isValid = Regex.IsMatch(morseInput, @"^[-.]+$");Di2015NewLine        if (isValid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("All permutations:");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            var nexts = Permutations(morseInput).ToList();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string next in nexts)Di2015NewLine                Write(next);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Format of morse must be only dots and dashes.");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Parameter name: {0}", morseInput);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14576129Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing WinRTXamlToolkit.AwaitableUI;Di2015NewLineusing Windows.UI.Xaml;Di2015NewLineusing Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WinRTXamlToolkit.Controls.ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Extension methods and attached properties for UIElement class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static class UIElementAnimationExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region AttachedFadeStoryboardDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// AttachedFadeStoryboard Attached Dependency PropertyDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty AttachedFadeStoryboardProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached(Di2015NewLine                "AttachedFadeStoryboard",Di2015NewLine                typeof(Storyboard),Di2015NewLine                typeof(UIElementAnimationExtensions),Di2015NewLine                new PropertyMetadata(null, OnAttachedFadeStoryboardChanged));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets the AttachedFadeStoryboard property. This dependency property Di2015NewLine        /// indicates the currently running custom fade in/out storyboard.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static Storyboard GetAttachedFadeStoryboard(DependencyObject d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Storyboard)d.GetValue(AttachedFadeStoryboardProperty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Sets the AttachedFadeStoryboard property. This dependency property Di2015NewLine        /// indicates the currently running custom fade in/out storyboard.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void SetAttachedFadeStoryboard(DependencyObject d, Storyboard value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            d.SetValue(AttachedFadeStoryboardProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Handles changes to the AttachedFadeStoryboard property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="d">Di2015NewLine        /// The <see cref="DependencyObject"/> on whichDi2015NewLine        /// the property has changed value.Di2015NewLine        /// </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="e">Di2015NewLine        /// Event data that is issued by any event thatDi2015NewLine        /// tracks changes to the effective value of this property.Di2015NewLine        /// </param>Di2015NewLine        private static void OnAttachedFadeStoryboardChanged(Di2015NewLine            DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Storyboard oldAttachedFadeStoryboard = (Storyboard)e.OldValue;Di2015NewLine            Storyboard newAttachedFadeStoryboard = (Storyboard)d.GetValue(AttachedFadeStoryboardProperty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region FadeIn()Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Fades the element in using the FadeInThemeAnimation.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// Opacity property of the element is not affected.<br/>Di2015NewLine        /// The duration of the visible animation itself is not affected by the duration parameter. It merely indicates how long the Storyboard will run.<br/>Di2015NewLine        /// If FadeOutThemeAnimation was not used on the element before - nothing will happen.<br/>Di2015NewLine        /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="element"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="duration"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static async Task FadeIn(this UIElement element, TimeSpan? duration = null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((FrameworkElement)element).Visibility = Visibility.Visible;Di2015NewLine            var fadeInStoryboard = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine            var fadeInAnimation = new FadeInThemeAnimation();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (duration != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fadeInAnimation.Duration = duration.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTarget(fadeInAnimation, element);Di2015NewLine            fadeInStoryboard.Children.Add(fadeInAnimation);Di2015NewLine            await fadeInStoryboard.BeginAsync();Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region FadeOut()Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Fades the element out using the FadeOutThemeAnimation.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// Opacity property of the element is not affected.<br/>Di2015NewLine        /// The duration of the visible animation itself is not affected by the duration parameter. It merely indicates how long the Storyboard will run.<br/>Di2015NewLine        /// If FadeOutThemeAnimation was already run before and FadeInThemeAnimation was not run after that - nothing will happen.<br/>Di2015NewLine        /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="element"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="duration"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static async Task FadeOut(this UIElement element, TimeSpan? duration = null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var fadeOutStoryboard = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine            var fadeOutAnimation = new FadeOutThemeAnimation();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (duration != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fadeOutAnimation.Duration = duration.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTarget(fadeOutAnimation, element);Di2015NewLine            fadeOutStoryboard.Children.Add(fadeOutAnimation);Di2015NewLine            await fadeOutStoryboard.BeginAsync();Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region FadeInCustom()Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Fades the element in using a custom DoubleAnimation of the Opacity property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="element"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="duration"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="easingFunction"> </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static async Task FadeInCustom(this UIElement element, TimeSpan? duration = null, EasingFunctionBase easingFunction = null, double targetOpacity = 1.0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CleanUpPreviousFadeStoryboard(element);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var fadeInStoryboard = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine            var fadeInAnimation = new DoubleAnimation();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (duration == null)Di2015NewLine                duration = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(0.4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            fadeInAnimation.Duration = duration.Value;Di2015NewLine            fadeInAnimation.To = targetOpacity;Di2015NewLine            fadeInAnimation.EasingFunction = easingFunction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTarget(fadeInAnimation, element);Di2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(fadeInAnimation, "Opacity");Di2015NewLine            fadeInStoryboard.Children.Add(fadeInAnimation);Di2015NewLine            SetAttachedFadeStoryboard(element, fadeInStoryboard);Di2015NewLine            await fadeInStoryboard.BeginAsync();Di2015NewLine            element.Opacity = targetOpacity;Di2015NewLine            fadeInStoryboard.Stop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region FadeOutCustom()Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Fades the element out using a custom DoubleAnimation of the Opacity property.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="element"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="duration"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="easingFunction"> </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static async Task FadeOutCustom(this UIElement element, TimeSpan? duration = null, EasingFunctionBase easingFunction = null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CleanUpPreviousFadeStoryboard(element); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var fadeOutStoryboard = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine            var fadeOutAnimation = new DoubleAnimation();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (duration == null)Di2015NewLine                duration = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(0.4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            fadeOutAnimation.Duration = duration.Value;Di2015NewLine            fadeOutAnimation.To = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            fadeOutAnimation.EasingFunction = easingFunction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTarget(fadeOutAnimation, element);Di2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(fadeOutAnimation, "Opacity");Di2015NewLine            fadeOutStoryboard.Children.Add(fadeOutAnimation);Di2015NewLine            SetAttachedFadeStoryboard(element, fadeOutStoryboard);Di2015NewLine            await fadeOutStoryboard.BeginAsync();Di2015NewLine            element.Opacity = 0.0;Di2015NewLine            fadeOutStoryboard.Stop();Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region CleanUpPreviousFadeStoryboard()Di2015NewLine        public static void CleanUpPreviousFadeStoryboard(this UIElement element)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attachedFadeStoryboard = GetAttachedFadeStoryboard(element);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (attachedFadeStoryboard != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                attachedFadeStoryboard.Stop();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14579566Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring serviceUrl = "http://localhost/E-WebServices/WSCustomer.asmx";Di2015NewLinevar client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLineServiceDescription descr;Di2015NewLineusing (var stream = client.OpenRead(serviceUrl + "?wsdl"))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    descr = ServiceDescription.Read(stream);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinevar importer = new ServiceDescriptionImporter()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ProtocolName = "Soap12",Di2015NewLine    Style = ServiceDescriptionImportStyle.Client,Di2015NewLine    CodeGenerationOptions = CodeGenerationOptions.GenerateProperties,Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineimporter.AddServiceDescription(descr, null, null);Di2015NewLine// Add any imported schemasDi2015NewLinevar importedSchemas = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineforeach (XmlSchema wsdlSchema in descr.Types.Schemas)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (XmlSchemaObject externalSchema in wsdlSchema.Includes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (externalSchema is XmlSchemaImport)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlSchemaImport schemaImport = externalSchema as XmlSchemaImport;Di2015NewLine            var split = schemaImport.Namespace.Split(new char[] { '/', '.' });Di2015NewLine            string schemaId = split[split.Count() - 2];Di2015NewLine            if (importedSchemas.Contains(schemaId))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            importedSchemas.Add(schemaId);Di2015NewLine            Uri schemaUri = new Uri(serviceUrl + "?schema=" + schemaId);Di2015NewLine            XmlSchema schema;Di2015NewLine            using (var wsdlStream = client.OpenRead(schemaUri))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                schema = XmlSchema.Read(wsdlStream, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            importer.Schemas.Add(schema);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinevar nmspace = new CodeNamespace();Di2015NewLinevar unit1 = new CodeCompileUnit();Di2015NewLineunit1.Namespaces.Add(nmspace);Di2015NewLinevar warning = importer.Import(nmspace, unit1);Di2015NewLineif (warning == 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CodeDomProvider provider1 = CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider("CSharp");Di2015NewLine    string[] assemblyReferences = new string[5] { "System.dll", "System.Web.Services.dll", "System.Web.dll", "System.Xml.dll", "System.Data.dll" };Di2015NewLine    CompilerParameters parms = new CompilerParameters(assemblyReferences);Di2015NewLine    CompilerResults results = provider1.CompileAssemblyFromDom(parms, unit1);Di2015NewLine    if (results.Errors.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (CompilerError oops in results.Errors)Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(oops.ErrorText);Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Compile Error Occured calling webservice");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    object service = results.CompiledAssembly.CreateInstance("WSCustomer");Di2015NewLine    Type t = service.GetType();Di2015NewLine    List<MethodInfo> methods = t.GetMethods().ToList();Di2015NewLine    // use them somehowDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14579990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IRowsBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool CanBuildFor(Type type);Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Type> SupportedTypes { get; }Di2015NewLine    ExcelRow BuildRow(object value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class RowsBuilder<T> : IRowsBuilder where T : ClassificationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Func<T, ExcelRow> _builder;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RowsBuilder(Func<T, ExcelRow> builder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(builder == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("builder");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _builder = builder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CanBuildFor(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type.IsSubclassOf(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Type> SupportedTypesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { yield return typeof(T); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ExcelRow BuildRow(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(!CanBuildFor(value.GetType()))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _builder((T)value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ExcelMediaTypeFormatter : BufferedMediaTypeFormatter Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ILookup<Type, IRowsBuilder> _builder;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ExcelMediaTypeFormatter(IEnumerable<IRowsBuilder> builder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _builder = builder.SelectMany(x => builder.SupportedTypesDi2015NewLine                                                  .Select(y => newDi2015NewLine                                                          {Di2015NewLine                                                              Type = y,Di2015NewLine                                                              Builder = xDi2015NewLine                                                          }))Di2015NewLine                          .ToLookup(x => x.Type, x => x.Builder); 14580810Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OggDFTDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int sample_length;Di2015NewLine    byte[] samples;Di2015NewLine    DragonOgg.MediaPlayer.OggFile f;Di2015NewLine    int rate = 0;Di2015NewLine    System.Numerics.Complex[][] frequencies;Di2015NewLine    DiscreteFourierTransform dft = new DiscreteFourierTransform();Di2015NewLine    int samplespacing = 128;Di2015NewLine    int samplesize = 1024;Di2015NewLine    int sampleCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ExampleLowpass()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int shiftUp = 1000; //1khzDi2015NewLine        int fade = 2; //8 sample fade.Di2015NewLine        int halfsize = samplesize / 2;Di2015NewLine        int kick = frequencies[0].Length * shiftUp / rate;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < sampleCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < frequencies[i].Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (j == 0 || j == halfsize)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                if (j < halfsize)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!(j < kick + 1))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        frequencies[i][j] = 0;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!(j - halfsize > halfsize - 1 - kick))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        frequencies[i][j] = 0;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dft.BluesteinInverse(frequencies[i], MathNet.Numerics.IntegralTransforms.FourierOptions.Default);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public OggDFT(DragonOgg.MediaPlayer.OggFile f)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Complex[] c = new Complex[10];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine            c[i] = i;Di2015NewLine        ShiftComplex(-2, c, 5, 10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.f = f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Make a 20MB buffer.Di2015NewLine        samples = new byte[20000000];Di2015NewLine        int sample_length = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This block here simply loads the uncompressed data from the ogg file into a nice n' large 20MB buffer. If you want to use the same library as I've used, It's called DragonOgg (If you cant tell by the namespace)Di2015NewLine        while (sample_length < samples.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bs = f.GetBufferSegment(4096); //Get ~4096 bytes (does not gurantee that 4096 bytes will be returned.Di2015NewLine            if (bs.ReturnValue == 0)Di2015NewLine                break; //End of fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Set the rateDi2015NewLine            rate = bs.RateHz;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Display some loading info:Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("seconds: " + sample_length / rate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //It's stereo so we want half the data.Di2015NewLine            int max = bs.ReturnValue / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Buffer overflow care.Di2015NewLine            if (samples.Length - sample_length < max)Di2015NewLine                max = samples.Length - sample_length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //The copier.Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < max; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //I'm using j * 2 here because I know that the input audio is 8Bit Stereo, and we want just one mono channel. So we skip every second one.Di2015NewLine                samples[sample_length + j] = bs.Buffer[j * 2];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sample_length += max;Di2015NewLine            if (max == 0)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sampleCount = (sample_length - 1) / samplespacing + 1;Di2015NewLine        frequencies = new System.Numerics.Complex[sampleCount][];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < sample_length; i += samplespacing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Sample---" + i + " / " + sample_length);Di2015NewLine            System.Numerics.Complex[] sample;Di2015NewLine            if (i + samplesize > sample_length)Di2015NewLine                sample = new System.Numerics.Complex[sample_length - i];Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                sample = new System.Numerics.Complex[samplesize];Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < sample.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sample[j] = (float)(samples[i + j] - 128) / 128.0f;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dft.BluesteinForward(sample, MathNet.Numerics.IntegralTransforms.FourierOptions.Default);Di2015NewLine            frequencies[i / samplespacing] = sample;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Perform the filters to the frequenciesDi2015NewLine        ExampleLowpass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Make window kernel thingyDi2015NewLine        float[] kernel = new float[samplesize / samplespacing * 2];Di2015NewLine        for (int i=0; i<kernel.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            kernel[i] = (float)((1-Math.Cos(2*Math.PI*i/(kernel.Length - 1)))/2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Apply window kernel thingyDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < sample_length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int jstart = i / samplespacing - samplesize / samplespacing + 1;Di2015NewLine            int jend = i / samplespacing;Di2015NewLine            if (jstart < 0) jstart = 0;Di2015NewLine            float ktotal = 0;Di2015NewLine            float stotal = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = jstart; j <= jend; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                float kernelHere = 1.0f;Di2015NewLine                if (jstart != jend)Di2015NewLine                    kernelHere = kernel[(j - jstart) * kernel.Length / (jend + 1 - jstart)];Di2015NewLine                int index = i - j * samplespacing;Di2015NewLine                stotal += (float)frequencies[j][index].Real * kernelHere;Di2015NewLine                ktotal += kernelHere;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (ktotal != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stotal /= ktotal;Di2015NewLine                samples[i] = (byte)(stotal * 128 * 0.9f + 128);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("BAD " + jstart + " " + jend + " sec: " + ((float)i / rate));Di2015NewLine                samples[i] = (byte)(stotal * 128 * 0.9f + 128);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(File.OpenWrite("sound"));Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < sample_length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(samples[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bw.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14580926Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MailAttachment: INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string dwgNo;Di2015NewLine    public string DwgNo{Di2015NewLine        get { return dwgNo; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dwgNo=value;Di2015NewLine            // Call NotifyPropertyChanged when the property is updatedDi2015NewLine            NotifyPropertyChanged("DwgNo");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Declare the PropertyChanged eventDi2015NewLine  public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // NotifyPropertyChanged will raise the PropertyChanged event passing theDi2015NewLine  // source property that is being updated.Di2015NewLine  public void NotifyPropertyChanged(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     if (PropertyChanged != null)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         PropertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14585672Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyProcessDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Process myProcess = new Process(); //Initialize a new Process of name myProcessDi2015NewLine        ProcessStartInfo ps = new ProcessStartInfo(); //Initialize a new ProcessStartInfo of name psDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ps.FileName = @"IExplore.exe"; //Set the target file name to IExplore.exeDi2015NewLine            ps.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Normal; //Set the window state when the process is started to NormalDi2015NewLine            myProcess.StartInfo = ps; //Associate the properties to pass to myProcess.Start() from psDi2015NewLine            myProcess.Start(); //Start the processDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e.Message); //Write the exception messageDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(3000); //Stop responding for 3 secondsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (myProcess.HasExited) //Continue if the process has exitedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //The process has exitedDi2015NewLine            //Console.WriteLine("The process has exited");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else //Continue if the process has not exitedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //myProcess.CloseMainWindow(); //Close the main WindowDi2015NewLine            myProcess.Kill(); //Terminate the processDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("press [enter] to exit"); //Writes press [enter] to exitDi2015NewLine        Console.Read(); //Waits for user inputDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14589220Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> IterateWhileMutating<T>(this IList<T> list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return list[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14589220Di2015UniqueSeparatorObservableCollection
14589220Di2015UniqueSeparatorObservableCollection
14589220Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> IterateWhileMutating<T>(this ObservableCollection<T> list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    list.CollectionChanged += (_, args) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (args.Action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine                if (args.NewStartingIndex <= i)Di2015NewLine                    i--;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move:Di2015NewLine                if (args.NewStartingIndex <= i)Di2015NewLine                    i--;Di2015NewLine                if (args.OldStartingIndex <= i) //note *not* else ifDi2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine                if (args.OldStartingIndex <= i)Di2015NewLine                    i++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine                i = int.MaxValue;//end the sequenceDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                //do nothingDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return list[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

<summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Retrieves a list of url entity objectsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    internal static List<Url> }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return urls;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Saves the list of Url entities Di2015NewLine    /// file so you have a copy of it if saving the new file failsDi2015NewLine            File.Copy(Path.Combine(UrlDAL.__FilePath, UrlDAL.__FileName), Path.Combine(UrlDAL.__FilePath, UrlDAL.__FileNameTemp));Di2015NewLine            //saving the new file will overwrite the existing fileDi2015NewLine            file.Save(UrlDAL.__FilePath);Di2015NewLine            //delete the old fileDi2015NewLine            File.Delete(Path.Combine(UrlDAL.__FilePath, UrlDAL.__FileNameTemp));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14594164Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class XmlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Converts an XDoc into a List<T> of entitiesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Any serializable object</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="doc"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static List<T> DeserializeCollection<T>(XDocument doc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (doc == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlSerializer serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(List<T>));Di2015NewLine            XmlReader reader = doc.CreateReader();Di2015NewLine            List<T> result = (List<T>)serializer.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine            reader.Close();Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //perform logging / error handlingDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Converts a List<T> of entities into an XDoc.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Any serializable object</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="paramList"></param>Di2015NewLine    public static XDocument SerializeCollection<T>(List<T> paramList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (paramList == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XDocument doc = new XDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlSerializer serializer = new XmlSerializer(paramList.GetType());Di2015NewLine            XmlWriter writer = doc.CreateWriter();Di2015NewLine            serializer.Serialize(writer, paramList);Di2015NewLine            writer.Close();Di2015NewLine            return doc;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //perform logging / error handlingDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14596424Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void LargestPalindrome()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ulong product = 0;Di2015NewLine    ulong compare = 0;Di2015NewLine    List<ulong> results = new List<ulong>();Di2015NewLine    for (uint i = 100; i < 1000; i++) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (uint j = 100; j < 1000; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            product = i * j;Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder value = new StringBuilder(product.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Pass string to reverseDi2015NewLine            string value_r = Reverse(value.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Check if Numeric PalindromeDi2015NewLine            if(value_r.Equals(value.ToString()) && product>compare)Di2015NewLine            {      Di2015NewLine                results.Add(product);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    results.Sort();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var palindrome in results)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(palindrome);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14599494Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.Entity;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass YourClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static List<TEntity> DoSomething<TEntity>(DbContext db, string valor, string atributo)Di2015NewLine        where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TEntity));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var matches = db.Set<TEntity>()Di2015NewLine                        .Where(Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, bool>>(Di2015NewLine                            Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                                Expression.Convert(Di2015NewLine                                    Expression.Property(mParam, atributo),Di2015NewLine                                    typeof(String)Di2015NewLine                                    ),Di2015NewLine                                "Contains",Di2015NewLine                                new Type[0],Di2015NewLine                                Expression.Constant(valor)Di2015NewLine                                ),Di2015NewLine                            mParamDi2015NewLine                         ));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return matches.ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14599494Di2015UniqueSeparatorString
14599494Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression.Convert
14599686Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] nums = Enumerable.Range(1, 20).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        int lcm = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < nums.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lcm = LCM(lcm, nums[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("LCM = {0}", lcm);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int LCM(int value1, int value2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int a = Math.Abs(value1);Di2015NewLine        int b = Math.Abs(value2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // perform division first to avoid potential overflowDi2015NewLine        a = checked((a / GCD(a, b)));Di2015NewLine        return checked((a * b));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int GCD(int value1, int value2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int gcd = 1;     // Greates Common DivisorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // throw exception if any value=0Di2015NewLine        if (value1 == 0 || value2 == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // assign absolute values to local varsDi2015NewLine        int a = Math.Abs(value1);            // local var1Di2015NewLine        int b = Math.Abs(value2);            // local var2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if numbers are equal return the firstDi2015NewLine        if (a == b) { return a; }Di2015NewLine            // if var "b" is GCD return "b"Di2015NewLine        if (a > b && a % b == 0) { return b; }Di2015NewLine            // if var "a" is GCD return "a"Di2015NewLine        if (b > a && b % a == 0) { return a; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Euclid algorithm to find GCD (a,b):Di2015NewLine        // estimated maximum iterations: Di2015NewLine        // 5* (number of dec digits in smallest number)Di2015NewLine        while (b != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gcd = b;Di2015NewLine            b = a % b;Di2015NewLine            a = gcd;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return gcd;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14600894Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static SemaphoreSlim TaskController = new SemaphoreSlim(4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var random = new Random(570);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Blocks thread without wasting CPUDi2015NewLine        // if the number of resources (4) is exhaustedDi2015NewLine        TaskController.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Started");Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(random.Next(1000, 3000));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Completed");Di2015NewLine            // Releases a resource meaning TaskController.Wait will unblockDi2015NewLine            TaskController.Release();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14601726Di2015UniqueSeparator  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //Not parallel, but suitable for monitoring queue purposes, Di2015NewLine    //can then focus on parallelizing each individual taskDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BlockingCollection<int> itemsQueue = new BlockingCollection<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = itemsQueue.GetConsumingEnumerable()Di2015NewLine        .Select(i =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Working on " + i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Focus your parallelization efforts on the work of Di2015NewLine            //the individual taskDi2015NewLine            //E.g, simulated:Di2015NewLine            double work = Enumerable.Range(0, 90000000 - (10 * (i % 3)))Di2015NewLine            .AsParallel()Di2015NewLine            .Select(w => w + 1)Di2015NewLine            .Average();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Finished " + i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return i;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TaskCompletionSource<bool> completion = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (int i in results)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Result Available: " + i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            completion.SetResult(true);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int iterations;Di2015NewLine        iterations = random.Next(5, 50);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("------- iterations: " + iterations + "-------");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= iterations; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            itemsQueue.Add(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char c = Console.ReadKey().KeyChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (c == 's')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ++iterations;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("adding: " + iterations);Di2015NewLine                itemsQueue.Add(iterations);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        itemsQueue.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        completion.Task.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Done!");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        itemsQueue.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14601726Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ImmediateOrderedPartitioner<T> : OrderablePartitioner<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IEnumerable<T> _consumingEnumerable;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Ordering _ordering = new Ordering();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ImmediateOrderedPartitioner(BlockingCollection<T> collection) : base(true, true, true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _consumingEnumerable = collection.GetConsumingEnumerable();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class OrderingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Order = -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class MyEnumerator<S> : IEnumerator<KeyValuePair<long, S>>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly object _orderLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly IEnumerable<S> _enumerable;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private KeyValuePair<long, S> _current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool _hasItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Ordering _ordering;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MyEnumerator(IEnumerable<S> consumingEnumerable, Ordering ordering)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _enumerable = consumingEnumerable;Di2015NewLine            _ordering = ordering;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public KeyValuePair<long, S> CurrentDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_hasItem)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return _current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object System.Collections.IEnumerator.CurrentDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool MoveNext()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_orderLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool canMoveNext = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var next = _enumerable.Take(1).FirstOrDefault(s => { canMoveNext = true; return true; });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (canMoveNext)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _current = new KeyValuePair<long, S>(++_ordering.Order, next);Di2015NewLine                    _hasItem = true;Di2015NewLine                    ++_ordering.Order;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _hasItem = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return canMoveNext;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Reset()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IList<IEnumerator<KeyValuePair<long, T>>> GetOrderablePartitions(int partitionCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new List<IEnumerator<KeyValuePair<long,T>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //for (int i = 0; i < partitionCount; ++i)Di2015NewLine        //{Di2015NewLine        //    result.Add(new MyEnumerator<T>(_consumingEnumerable, _ordering));Di2015NewLine        //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine        BlockingCollection<int> itemsQueue = new BlockingCollection<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var partitioner = new ImmediateOrderedPartitioner<int>(itemsQueue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = partitionerDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        itemsQueue.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        completion.Task.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Done!");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        itemsQueue.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14601726Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class QueuedItem<TInput, TResult>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _lockObject = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private TResult _result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly TInput _input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly TResult _notfinished;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal readonly bool IsEndQueue = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal QueuedItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IsEndQueue = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public QueuedItem(TInput input, TResult notfinished)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _input = input;Di2015NewLine        _notfinished = notfinished;Di2015NewLine        _result = _notfinished;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TResult ReadResult()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_lockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!IsResultReady)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Check IsResultReady before calling ReadResult()");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteResult(TResult value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_lockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsResultReady)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Result has already been written");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _result = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TInput Input { get { return _input; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsResultReadyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_lockObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return !object.Equals(_result, _notfinished) || IsEndQueue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ParallelImmediateOrderedProcessingQueue<TInput, TResult>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ReaderWriterLockSlim _addLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly object _readingResultsLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly ConcurrentQueue<QueuedItem<TInput, TResult>> _concurrentQueue = new ConcurrentQueue<QueuedItem<TInput, TResult>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool _isFinishedAdding = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly TResult _notFinished;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Action<QueuedItem<TInput, TResult>> _processor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <param name="notFinished">A value that indicates the result is not yet finished</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="processor">Must call SetResult() on argument when finished.</param>Di2015NewLine    public ParallelImmediateOrderedProcessingQueue(TResult notFinished, Action<QueuedItem<TInput, TResult>> processor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _notFinished = notFinished;Di2015NewLine        _processor = processor;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event Action ResultsReady = delegate { };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SignalResult()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            QueuedItem<TInput, TResult> item;Di2015NewLine            if (_concurrentQueue.TryPeek(out item) && item.IsResultReady)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ResultsReady();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(TInput input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool shouldThrow = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _addLock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            shouldThrow = _isFinishedAdding;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!shouldThrow)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var queuedItem = new QueuedItem<TInput, TResult>(input, _notFinished);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _concurrentQueue.Enqueue(queuedItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Task.Factory.StartNew(() => { _processor(queuedItem); SignalResult(); });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _addLock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (shouldThrow)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("An attempt was made to add an item, but adding items was marked as completed");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<TResult> ConsumeReadyResults()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //lock necessary to preserve orderingDi2015NewLine        lock (_readingResultsLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            QueuedItem<TInput, TResult> queuedItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (_concurrentQueue.TryPeek(out queuedItem) && queuedItem.IsResultReady)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!_concurrentQueue.TryDequeue(out queuedItem))Di2015NewLine                    throw new ApplicationException("this shouldn't happen");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (queuedItem.IsEndQueue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _completion.SetResult(true);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return queuedItem.ReadResult();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void CompleteAddingItems()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _addLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _isFinishedAdding = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var queueCompletion = new QueuedItem<TInput, TResult>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _concurrentQueue.Enqueue(queueCompletion);Di2015NewLine            Task.Factory.StartNew(() => { SignalResult(); });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _addLock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TaskCompletionSource<bool> _completion = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WaitForCompletion()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _completion.Task.Wait();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int notFinished = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var processingQueue = new ParallelImmediateOrderedProcessingQueue<int, int>(notFinished, qi =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int work = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Working on " + qi.Input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //simulate workDi2015NewLine            int maxBusy = 90000000 - (10 * (qi.Input % 3));Di2015NewLine            for (int busy = 0; busy <= maxBusy; ++busy) { ++work; };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Finished " + qi.Input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            qi.WriteResult(qi.Input);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        processingQueue.ResultsReady += new Action(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (int result in processingQueue.ConsumeReadyResults())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Results Available: " + result);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int iterations = new Random().Next(5, 50);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("------- iterations: " + iterations + "-------");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= iterations; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            processingQueue.Add(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char c = Console.ReadKey().KeyChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (c == 's')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ++iterations;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("adding: " + iterations);Di2015NewLine                processingQueue.Add(iterations);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        processingQueue.CompleteAddingItems();Di2015NewLine        processingQueue.WaitForCompletion();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Done!");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14601765Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar redux = TreeReduction(rootNode, 0);Di2015NewLine
14601765Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate TreeNode TreeReduction(TreeNode node, int currentLevel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(node==null)Di2015NewLine          return null;Di2015NewLine        if(node.Count() == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var redux = TreeReduction(node.GetFirstChild(), currentLevel);Di2015NewLine            return redux?? new TreeNode(node.ID{level=currentLevel});Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var newNode = new TreeNode(node.ID{level=currentLevel});Di2015NewLine        foreach (var child in node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var newChild = TreeReduction(child, currentLevel+1);Di2015NewLine            if(newChild!=null)Di2015NewLine               newNode.AddChild(newChild);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return newNode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
