14604063Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection.Emit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace emitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic class ProxyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region staticDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly AssemblyBuilder AssemblyBuilder;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly ModuleBuilder ModuleBuilder;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly object LockObj = new Object();Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<string, Type> TypeCache = new Dictionary<string, Type>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Proxy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (LockObj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AssemblyBuilder = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine                new AssemblyName("Taga.Proxies"),Di2015NewLine                AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var assemblyName = AssemblyBuilder.GetName().Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ModuleBuilder = AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule(assemblyName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Type GetImplementedType(Type baseType, Type[] interfaceTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = GetTypeKey(baseType, interfaceTypes);Di2015NewLine        return TypeCache.ContainsKey(key) ? TypeCache[key] : null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void AddImplementation(Type baseType, Type[] interfaceTypes, Type implementationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = GetTypeKey(baseType, interfaceTypes);Di2015NewLine        TypeCache.Add(key, implementationType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetTypeKey(Type baseType, Type[] interfaceTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        key += baseType.FullName;Di2015NewLine        key = interfaceTypes.Aggregate(key, (current, interfaceType) => current + interfaceType);Di2015NewLine        return key;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static TBase Of<TBase>(ICallHandler callHandler, params Type[] interfaceTypes) where TBase : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var builder = new Proxy(typeof(TBase), interfaceTypes);Di2015NewLine        var type = builder.GetProxyType();Di2015NewLine        return (TBase)Activator.CreateInstance(type, callHandler);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object Of(ICallHandler callHandler, Type[] interfaceTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (interfaceTypes == null || interfaceTypes.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("No interface type specified");Di2015NewLine        return Of<object>(callHandler, interfaceTypes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ProxyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private TypeBuilder _typeBuilder;Di2015NewLine    private FieldBuilder _callHandlerFieldBuilder;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Type _baseClassType;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Type[] _interfaceTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Proxy(Type baseClassType, Type[] interfaceTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (interfaceTypes == null || !interfaceTypes.Any())Di2015NewLine            _interfaceTypes = Type.EmptyTypes;Di2015NewLine        else if (interfaceTypes.Any(it => !it.IsInterface || !it.IsPublic || it.IsGenericType))Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Interface Types must be public and non generic");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            _interfaceTypes = interfaceTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (baseClassType == null)Di2015NewLine            _baseClassType = typeof(object);Di2015NewLine        else if (!baseClassType.IsClass || baseClassType.IsAbstract || baseClassType.IsGenericType || baseClassType.IsSealed || !baseClassType.IsPublic || !baseClassType.HasDefaultConstructor())Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Base Class Type must be a public, non-sealed, non-abstract, non-generic class with a public default constructor");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            _baseClassType = baseClassType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string _typeName;Di2015NewLine    private string TypeNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _typeName ?? (_typeName = BuildTypeName()); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string BuildTypeName()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var typeName = "__";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_baseClassType != null)Di2015NewLine            typeName += _baseClassType.Name + "__";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var interfaceType in _interfaceTypes)Di2015NewLine            typeName += interfaceType.Name + "__";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return typeName + "Proxy__";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Type GetProxyType()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = GetImplementedType(_baseClassType, _interfaceTypes);Di2015NewLine        if (type != null)Di2015NewLine            return type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        type = BuildType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AddImplementation(_baseClassType, _interfaceTypes, type);Di2015NewLine        return type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Type BuildType()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitTypeBuilder();Di2015NewLine        DefineCallHandlerField();Di2015NewLine        BuildConstructor();Di2015NewLine        ExtendBase();Di2015NewLine        ImplementInterfaces();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _typeBuilder.CreateType();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InitTypeBuilder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // public class __BaseClass__Interface1__Interface2__Proxy__ : BaseClass, Interface1, Interface2Di2015NewLine        _typeBuilder = ModuleBuilder.DefineType(Di2015NewLine            TypeName,Di2015NewLine            TypeAttributes.Public | TypeAttributes.Class,Di2015NewLine            _baseClassType,Di2015NewLine            _interfaceTypes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DefineCallHandlerField()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // private ICallHandler _callHandler;Di2015NewLine        _callHandlerFieldBuilder = _typeBuilder.DefineField("_callHandler", typeof(ICallHandler), FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void BuildConstructor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var constructorBuilder = DeclareContsructor();   // public ProxyClass(ICallHandler callHandler)Di2015NewLine        ImplementConstructor(constructorBuilder);       // : base() { this._callHandler = callHandler; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ExtendBase()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var mi in _baseClassType.GetVirtualMethods())Di2015NewLine            BuildMethod(mi);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ImplementInterfaces()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var methodInfo in _interfaceTypes.SelectMany(interfaceType => interfaceType.GetMethods()))Di2015NewLine            BuildMethod(methodInfo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ConstructorBuilder DeclareContsructor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var constructorBuilder = _typeBuilder.DefineConstructor(Di2015NewLine            MethodAttributes.Public,Di2015NewLine            CallingConventions.HasThis,Di2015NewLine            new[] { typeof(ICallHandler) });Di2015NewLine        return constructorBuilder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ImplementConstructor(ConstructorBuilder constructorBuilder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var baseCtor = _baseClassType.GetConstructor(Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var il = constructorBuilder.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // call base ctorDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // push thisDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Call, baseCtor); // Call base constructor this.base(); pops thisDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // set _callHandlerDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // push thisDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1); // push callHandler argumentDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, _callHandlerFieldBuilder); // this._callHandler = callHandler, pop this, pop callhandler argumentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret); // exit ctorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void BuildMethod(MethodInfo mi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methodBuilder = CallHandlerMethodBuilder.GetInstance(_typeBuilder, mi, _callHandlerFieldBuilder);Di2015NewLine        methodBuilder.Build();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CallHandlerMethodImplementor : CallHandlerMethodBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal CallHandlerMethodImplementor(TypeBuilder typeBuilder, MethodInfo methodInfo, FieldBuilder callHandlerFieldBuilder)Di2015NewLine        : base(typeBuilder, methodInfo, callHandlerFieldBuilder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void SetReturnValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // object res = returnValue;Di2015NewLine        ReturnValue = IL.DeclareLocal(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        if (MethodInfo.ReturnType != typeof(void))Di2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, ReturnValue); // pop return value of BeforeCall into resDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Pop); // pop return value of BeforeCallDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CallHandlerMethodOverrider : CallHandlerMethodBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal CallHandlerMethodOverrider(TypeBuilder typeBuilder, MethodInfo methodInfo, FieldBuilder callHandlerFieldBuilder)Di2015NewLine        : base(typeBuilder, methodInfo, callHandlerFieldBuilder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void SetReturnValue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // ReturnValue = base.Method(args...)Di2015NewLine        CallBaseMethod();Di2015NewLine        // stack'ta base'den dnen deer varDi2015NewLine        SetReturnValueFromBase();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CallBaseMethod()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Pop); // pop return value of BeforeCallDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // base'den Method'u arDi2015NewLine        // returnValue = base.Method(params...)Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // push this Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < ParameterCount; i++)  // metoda gelen parametreleri stack'e atDi2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_S, i + 1);// push params[i]Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Call, MethodInfo); // base.Method(params) pop this, pop params push return valueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetReturnValueFromBase()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ReturnValue = IL.DeclareLocal(typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (MethodInfo.ReturnType == typeof(void))Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // unbox returnValue if requiredDi2015NewLine        if (MethodInfo.ReturnType.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Box, MethodInfo.ReturnType);Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, ReturnValue); // pop return value into resDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineabstract class CallHandlerMethodBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ParameterInfo[] _parameters;Di2015NewLine    private MethodBuilder _methodBuilder;Di2015NewLine    private readonly TypeBuilder _typeBuilder;Di2015NewLine    private readonly FieldBuilder _callHandlerFieldBuilder;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected readonly MethodInfo MethodInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected ILGenerator IL { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    protected int ParameterCount { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private MethodInfo _beforeCall;Di2015NewLine    private MethodInfo BeforeCallDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _beforeCall ?? (_beforeCall = typeof(ICallHandler).GetMethods().First(m => m.Name == "BeforeMethodCall"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private MethodInfo _afterCall;Di2015NewLine    private MethodInfo AfterCallDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _afterCall ?? (_afterCall = typeof(ICallHandler).GetMethods().First(m => m.Name == "AfterMethodCall"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private MethodInfo _onError;Di2015NewLine    private MethodInfo OnErrorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _onError ?? (_onError = typeof(ICallHandler).GetMethods().First(m => m.Name == "OnError"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected CallHandlerMethodBuilder(TypeBuilder typeBuilder, MethodInfo methodInfo, FieldBuilder callHandlerFieldBuilder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _typeBuilder = typeBuilder;Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo = methodInfo;Di2015NewLine        _callHandlerFieldBuilder = callHandlerFieldBuilder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Declare()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // public override? ReturnType Method(arguments...)Di2015NewLine        _methodBuilder = _typeBuilder.DefineMethod(MethodInfo.Name,Di2015NewLine                                                      MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.HideBySig | MethodAttributes.Virtual,Di2015NewLine                                                      MethodInfo.ReturnType,Di2015NewLine                                                      MethodInfo.GetParameterTypes());Di2015NewLine        IL = _methodBuilder.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _parameters = MethodInfo.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        ParameterCount = _parameters.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private LocalBuilder _objParameter;Di2015NewLine    private void SetObjectParameter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // CallHandlera verilecek object objDi2015NewLine        _objParameter = IL.DeclareLocal(typeof(object)); // object obj;Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // push thisDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, _objParameter); // obj = this; pops thisDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private LocalBuilder _methodInfoParameter;Di2015NewLine    private void SetMethodInfoParameter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // CallHandlera verilecek MethodInfo methodInfoDi2015NewLine        _methodInfoParameter = IL.DeclareLocal(typeof(MethodInfo)); // MethodInfo methodInfo;Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldtoken, MethodInfo);Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Call, typeof(MethodBase).GetMethod(Di2015NewLine            "GetMethodFromHandle", new[] { typeof(RuntimeMethodHandle) })); // MethodBase.GetMethodFromHandle(new RuntimeMethodHandle());Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, _methodInfoParameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private LocalBuilder _argsParameter;Di2015NewLine    private void SetArgsParameters()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // CallHandlera verilecek object[] argsDi2015NewLine        _argsParameter = IL.DeclareLocal(typeof(object[])); // object[] args;Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4, ParameterCount); // push parameterCount as Int32Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Newarr, typeof(object)); // push new object[parameterCount]; pops parameterCountDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, _argsParameter); // args = new object[ParameterCount]; pops new object[parameterCount]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Metoda gelen parametreleri args'a doldurDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < ParameterCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var parameterInfo = _parameters[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _argsParameter); // push argsDi2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4, i); // push iDi2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_S, i + 1); // push params[i]; pops i; metoda gelen parametrelerin i'incisi. 0'nc parametre this olduu iin  "+1" varDi2015NewLine            if (parameterInfo.ParameterType.IsPrimitive || parameterInfo.ParameterType.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine                IL.Emit(OpCodes.Box, parameterInfo.ParameterType); // (object)params[i]Di2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Stelem_Ref); // args[i] = (object)params[i]; pops params[i]Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Try()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IL.BeginExceptionBlock(); // try {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InvokeBeforeMethodCall()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this._callHandler.BeforeCall(obj, methodInfo, args);Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // push thisDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, _callHandlerFieldBuilder); // push _callHandler; pops thisDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _objParameter); // push objDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _methodInfoParameter); // push methodInfo Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _argsParameter); // push argsDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Call, BeforeCall); // _callHandler.BeforeCall(obj, methodInfo, args); push return valueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected LocalBuilder ReturnValue;Di2015NewLine    protected abstract void SetReturnValue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InvokeAfterMethodCall()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this._callHandler.AfterCall(obj, methodInfo, args, returnValue);Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // push thisDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, _callHandlerFieldBuilder); // push _callHandler; pops thisDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _objParameter); // push objDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _methodInfoParameter); // push methodInfo Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _argsParameter); // push argsDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, ReturnValue); // push resDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Call, AfterCall); // _callHandler.AfterCall(obj, methodInfo, args, returnValue); push return value (void deilse)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Catch()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ex = IL.DeclareLocal(typeof(Exception)); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IL.BeginCatchBlock(typeof(Exception));          // catch Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc_S, ex);                   // (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine        InvokeOnError(ex);                              //     _callHandler.AfterCall(obj, methodInfo, args);Di2015NewLine        IL.EndExceptionBlock();                         // }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InvokeOnError(LocalBuilder exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this._callHandler.OnError(obj, methodInfo, args);Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // push thisDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, _callHandlerFieldBuilder); // push _callHandler; pops thisDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _objParameter); // push objDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _methodInfoParameter); // push methodInfo Di2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, _argsParameter); // push argsDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, exception); // push exDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Call, OnError); // _callHandler.AfterCall(obj, methodInfo, args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Return()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (MethodInfo.ReturnType != typeof(void))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, ReturnValue); // push returnValueDi2015NewLine            IL.Emit(OpCodes.Unbox_Any, MethodInfo.ReturnType); // (ReturnType)returnValueDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IL.Emit(OpCodes.Ret); // returns the value on the stack, if ReturnType is void stack should be emptyDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal void Build()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Declare();                   // public override? ReturnType Method(arguments...) {Di2015NewLine        SetObjectParameter();        //     object obj = this;Di2015NewLine        SetMethodInfoParameter();    //     MethodInfo methodInfo = MethodBase.GetMethodFromHandle(new RuntimeMethodHandle());Di2015NewLine        SetArgsParameters();         //     object[] args = arguments;Di2015NewLine        Try();                       //     try {Di2015NewLine        InvokeBeforeMethodCall();    //         object returnValue = _callHandler.BeforeMethodCall(obj, methodInfo, args);Di2015NewLine        SetReturnValue();            //         !IsAbstract => returnValue = (object)base.Method(arguments);Di2015NewLine        InvokeAfterMethodCall();     //         _callHandler.AfterMethodCall(obj, methodInfo, args, returnValue);Di2015NewLine        Catch();                     //      } catch (Exception ex) { _callHandler.OnError(obj, methodInfo, args, ex); }Di2015NewLine        Return();                    //     IsVoid ? (return;) : return (ReturnType)returnValue; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static CallHandlerMethodBuilder GetInstance(TypeBuilder typeBuilder, MethodInfo methodInfo, FieldBuilder callHandlerFieldBuilder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (methodInfo.IsAbstract)Di2015NewLine            return new CallHandlerMethodImplementor(typeBuilder, methodInfo, callHandlerFieldBuilder);Di2015NewLine        return new CallHandlerMethodOverrider(typeBuilder, methodInfo, callHandlerFieldBuilder);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface ICallHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object  BeforeMethodCall    (object obj, MethodInfo mi, object[] args);Di2015NewLine    void    AfterMethodCall     (object obj, MethodInfo mi, object[] args, object returnValue);Di2015NewLine    void    OnError             (object obj, MethodInfo mi, object[] args, Exception exception);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ReflectionExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool HasDefaultConstructor(this Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type.GetConstructors(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance).Any(ctor => !ctor.GetParameters().Any());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type[] GetParameterTypes(this MethodInfo methodInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return methodInfo.GetParameters().Select(pi => pi.ParameterType).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MethodBuilder GetMethodBuilder(this TypeBuilder typeBuilder, MethodInfo mi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.HideBySig | MethodAttributes.NewSlot | MethodAttributes.VirtualDi2015NewLine        return typeBuilder.DefineMethod(mi.Name, mi.Attributes, mi.ReturnType, mi.GetParameterTypes());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MethodInfo[] GetVirtualMethods(this Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type.GetMethods().Where(mi => mi.IsVirtual).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object GetDefaultValue(this Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return typeof(ReflectionExtensions).GetMethod("Default").MakeGenericMethod(t).Invoke(null, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T Default<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14604063Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Globalization;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace emitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture = new CultureInfo("en-GB");Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TestProxy();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("OK");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void TestProxy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var obj = Proxy.Of<TestClass>(new CallHandler(), typeof(IInterface1), typeof(IInterface2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        obj.MethodVoid();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(obj.PublicSquare(3));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(obj.MethodString());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(obj.MethodInt());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(obj.MethodComplex(45, " Deneme ", new Ogrenci { Name = "Ali" }).Name);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        obj.PropInt = 78;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(obj.PropInt);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var int1 = obj as IInterface1;Di2015NewLine        int1.Name = "Interface";Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Got: " + int1.Name);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        int1.Name = "Interface333";Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Got3: " + int1.Name);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(int1.MethodString(34, "Par", new Ogrenci { Name = "Veli" }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var int2 = obj as IInterface2;Di2015NewLine        int2.Value = 14;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Got: " + int2.Value);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        int2.Value = 333;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Got3: " + int2.Value);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(int2.MethodInt(34, "Par", new Ogrenci { Name = "Veli" }));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        obj.ThrowException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CallHandler : ICallHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly SortedDictionary<string, object> _propertyValues = new SortedDictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object BeforeMethodCall(object obj, MethodInfo mi, object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WriteParameterInfo(mi, args);Di2015NewLine        return SetReturnValue(mi, args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AfterMethodCall(object obj, MethodInfo mi, object[] args, object returnValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (mi.ReturnType == typeof(void))Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(mi.Name + " returns [void]");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(mi.Name + " returns [" + (returnValue ?? "null") + "]");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnError(object obj, MethodInfo mi, object[] args, Exception exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Exception Handled: " + exception.Message);Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException(exception.Message, exception);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private object SetReturnValue(MethodInfo mi, object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object res = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (mi.Name.StartsWith("get_"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var propName = mi.Name.Replace("get_", "");Di2015NewLine            if (_propertyValues.ContainsKey(propName))Di2015NewLine                res = _propertyValues[propName];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (mi.Name.StartsWith("set_"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var propName = mi.Name.Replace("set_", "");Di2015NewLine            if (!_propertyValues.ContainsKey(propName))Di2015NewLine                _propertyValues.Add(propName, args[0]);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                _propertyValues[propName] = args[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (mi.IsAbstract && mi.ReturnType != typeof(void))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            res = mi.ReturnType.GetDefaultValue();Di2015NewLine            var methodName = mi.Name;Di2015NewLine            if (!_propertyValues.ContainsKey(methodName))Di2015NewLine                _propertyValues.Add(methodName, res);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                _propertyValues[methodName] = res;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (mi.ReturnType == typeof(void))Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(mi.Name + " should return [void]");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(mi.Name + " should return [" + res + "]");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteParameterInfo(MethodInfo mi, object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(mi.Name + " takes ");Di2015NewLine        if (args.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("no parameter");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} parameter(s)", args.Length);Di2015NewLine            var paramInfos = mi.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < args.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("\\t[{0} {1}: '{2}']", paramInfos[i].ParameterType.Name, paramInfos[i].Name, args[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IInterface1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string Name { get; set; 14605221Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Example of datasetDi2015NewLine    List<TransactionInfo> transactionInfos = new List<TransactionInfo>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(1, "A", "B"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(2, "A", "C"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(3, "A", "D"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(4, "G", "H"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(5, "C", "M"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(6, "D", "E"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(7, "A", "F"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(8, "H", "L"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(9, "L", "R"),Di2015NewLine        new TransactionInfo(10, "Y", "Z"),Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Creates the graph and add the arcsDi2015NewLine    UndirectedGraph<string> graph = new UndirectedGraph<string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (TransactionInfo transactionInfo in transactionInfos)Di2015NewLine        graph.AddArc(transactionInfo.SellerName, transactionInfo.BuyerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = (from clusterByNode in graph.GetConnectedComponents()  // Gets the connected componentsDi2015NewLine                  select (from transactionInfo in transactionInfos  // Gets the transaction infosDi2015NewLine                          join node in clusterByNode on transactionInfo.BuyerName equals node  // Joins the transactionInfo with the node in the connected componentDi2015NewLine                          select transactionInfo).ToList()).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14605221Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TransactionInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public long TransactionId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string BuyerName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string SellerName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TransactionInfo(long transactionId, string buyerName, string sellerName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TransactionId = transactionId;Di2015NewLine        BuyerName = buyerName;Di2015NewLine        SellerName = sellerName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14605221Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UndirectedGraph<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<T, HashSet<T>> linkedNodes = new Dictionary<T, HashSet<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddNode(T node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!linkedNodes.ContainsKey(node))Di2015NewLine            linkedNodes.Add(node, new HashSet<T>());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddArc(T node1, T node2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!linkedNodes.ContainsKey(node1))Di2015NewLine            linkedNodes.Add(node1, new HashSet<T>());Di2015NewLine        linkedNodes[node1].Add(node2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!linkedNodes.ContainsKey(node2))Di2015NewLine            linkedNodes.Add(node2, new HashSet<T>());Di2015NewLine        linkedNodes[node2].Add(node1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<HashSet<T>> GetConnectedComponents()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HashSet<T> visitedNodes = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (T nodeToVisit in linkedNodes.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!visitedNodes.Contains(nodeToVisit))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                HashSet<T> connectedComponent = GetConnectedComponent(nodeToVisit);Di2015NewLine                visitedNodes.UnionWith(connectedComponent);Di2015NewLine                yield return connectedComponent;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private HashSet<T> GetConnectedComponent(T from)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HashSet<T> result = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stack<T> nodesToVisit = new Stack<T>();Di2015NewLine        nodesToVisit.Push(from);Di2015NewLine        result.Add(from);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (nodesToVisit.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T nodeToVisit = nodesToVisit.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (T linkedNode in linkedNodes[nodeToVisit])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!result.Contains(linkedNode))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    nodesToVisit.Push(linkedNode);Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(linkedNode);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14606323Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<fileName>[A-Za-z0-9-# ]*)_?(?<version>[0-9]+)?\\.dwg
14606323Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar fileName = file.Key + "_" + file.Value + ".dwg"
14606323Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar files = new[] {Di2015NewLine    "ABBIE 08-10 #6-09H4 FINAL 06-12-2012.dwg",Di2015NewLine    "ABBIE 08-10 #6-09H4 FINAL 06-12-2012_1.dwg",Di2015NewLine    "ABBIE 08-10 #6-09H4 FINAL 06-12-2012_2.dwg",Di2015NewLine    "Second File.dwg",Di2015NewLine    "Second File_1.dwg",Di2015NewLine    "Third File.dwg"Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// regex to split fileName from versionDi2015NewLinevar r = new Regex( @"(?<fileName>[A-Za-z0-9-# ]*)_?(?<version>[0-9]+)?\\.dwg" );Di2015NewLinevar latestFiles = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var f in files)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parsedFileName = r.Match( f );Di2015NewLine    var fileName = parsedFileName.Groups["fileName"].Value; Di2015NewLine    var version = parsedFileName.Groups["version"].Success ? int.Parse( parsedFileName.Groups["version"].Value ) : 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if( latestFiles.ContainsKey( fileName ) && version > latestFiles[fileName] )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // replace if this file has a newer versionDi2015NewLine        latestFiles[fileName] = version;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // add all newly found filenamesDi2015NewLine        latestFiles.Add( fileName, version );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// open all most recent filesDi2015NewLineforeach (var file in latestFiles)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var fileToCopy = File.Open( file.Key + "_" + file.Value + ".dwg" );Di2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14607312Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string id = context.Request.QueryString["Id"];Di2015NewLine    string constr = System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["EmployeeDatabase"].ConnectionString;Di2015NewLine    using (var con = new SqlConnection(constr))Di2015NewLine    using (var cmd = con.CreateCommand())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        con.Open();Di2015NewLine        cmd.CommandText = "GetImage";Di2015NewLine        cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@EmpID", id);Di2015NewLine        using (var dr = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (dr.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // the image was foundDi2015NewLine                byte[] imageBytes = (byte[])dr.GetValue(0);Di2015NewLine                // Don't forget to set the proper content typeDi2015NewLine                context.Response.ContentType = "image/png";Di2015NewLine                context.Response.BinaryWrite(imageBytes);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // no record found in the database => return 404Di2015NewLine                context.Response.StatusCode = 404;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       Debug.WriteLine( "this is not a decimal value".Parse<decimal>( -1 ) );Di2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine( "12342.3233443".Parse<decimal>() );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic public class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    static private Dictionary<Type,MethodInfo> s_methods = new Dictionary<Type, MethodInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public T Parse<T> ( this string value ) where T : structDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        return value.Parse<T>( default( T ) );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public T Parse<T> ( this string value, T defaultValue ) where T : structDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        // *EDITED* to cache the ).MakeByRefType() }Di2015NewLine                 , nullDi2015NewLine                 );Di2015NewLine            s_methods.Add( typeof( T ), m );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var args = new object[] { value, null };Di2015NewLine        if( (bool)m.Invoke( null, args ))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            return (T) args[ 1 ];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        return defaultValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14619272Di2015UniqueSeparator.cs
14619272Di2015UniqueSeparator private bool ValidateImageSize(System.Drawing.Image imgPopup, string strSource)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Messure height & width and show popup;Di2015NewLine        if ((strSource == "MainPopup") && (imgPopup.Height > 768 || imgPopup.Width > 1024))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (strSource == "SmallPopup" && imgPopup.Height > 300 || imgPopup.Width > 400)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14619300Di2015UniqueSeparator    public byte[] callbackData { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Delegate to call backDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [NotMapped]Di2015NewLine    public Callback callbackDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_callback == null && callbackData != null && callbackData.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                using (var stream = new MemoryStream(callbackData))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _callback = formatter.Deserialize(stream) as Callback;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return _callback;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _callback = value;Di2015NewLine            if (value == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                callbackData = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                using (var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    formatter.Serialize(stream, value);Di2015NewLine                    callbackData = stream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14620508Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ClipboardHtmlOutputDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Double Version { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public String Source { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public String Input { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    //public String Html { get { return Input.Substring(startHTML, (endHTML - startHTML)); } }Di2015NewLine    public String Html { get { return Input.Substring(startHTML, Math.Min(endHTML - startHTML, Input.Length - startHTML)); } }Di2015NewLine    public String Fragment { get { return Input.Substring(startFragment, (endFragment - startFragment)); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int startHTML;Di2015NewLine    private int endHTML;Di2015NewLine    private int startFragment;Di2015NewLine    private int endFragment;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static ClipboardHtmlOutput ParseString(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ClipboardHtmlOutput html = new ClipboardHtmlOutput();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string pattern = @"Version:(?<version>[0-9]+(?:\\.[0-9]*)?).+StartHTML:(?<startH>\\d*).+EndHTML:(?<endH>\\d*).+StartFragment:(?<startF>\\d+).+EndFragment:(?<endF>\\d*).+SourceURL:(?<source>f|ht{1}tps?://[-a-zA-Z0-9@:%_\\+.~#?&//=]+)";Di2015NewLine        Match match = Regex.Match(s, pattern, RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                html.Input = s;Di2015NewLine                html.Version = Double.Parse(match.Groups["version"].Value, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine                html.Source = match.Groups["source"].Value;Di2015NewLine                html.startHTML = int.Parse(match.Groups["startH"].Value);Di2015NewLine                html.endHTML = int.Parse(match.Groups["endH"].Value);Di2015NewLine                html.startFragment = int.Parse(match.Groups["startF"].Value);Di2015NewLine                html.endFragment = int.Parse(match.Groups["endF"].Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception fe)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return html;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14624690Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static EqualityComparer<T> DefaultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EqualityComparer<T> defaultComparer = EqualityComparer<T>.defaultComparer;Di2015NewLine        if (defaultComparer == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            defaultComparer = EqualityComparer<T>.CreateComparer();Di2015NewLine            EqualityComparer<T>.defaultComparer = defaultComparer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return defaultComparer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static EqualityComparer<T> CreateComparer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    RuntimeType c = (RuntimeType) typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    if (c == typeof(byte))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (EqualityComparer<T>) new ByteEqualityComparer();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (typeof(IEquatable<T>).IsAssignableFrom(c))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (EqualityComparer<T>) RuntimeTypeHandle.CreateInstanceForAnotherGenericParameter((RuntimeType) typeof(GenericEqualityComparer<int>), c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (c.IsGenericType && (c.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RuntimeType type2 = (RuntimeType) c.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(IEquatable<>).MakeGenericType(new Type[] { type2 }).IsAssignableFrom(type2))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (EqualityComparer<T>) RuntimeTypeHandle.CreateInstanceForAnotherGenericParameter((RuntimeType) typeof(NullableEqualityComparer<int>), type2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (c.IsEnum && (Enum.GetUnderlyingType(c) == typeof(int)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (EqualityComparer<T>) RuntimeTypeHandle.CreateInstanceForAnotherGenericParameter((RuntimeType) typeof(EnumEqualityComparer<int>), c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new ObjectEqualityComparer<T>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14626460Di2015UniqueSeparatorIntersects()
14626460Di2015UniqueSeparatorUnit
14626460Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a Ray translating screen cursor position into screen positionDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="projectionMatrix"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="viewMatrix"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public Ray CalculateCursorRay(Matrix projectionMatrix, Matrix viewMatrix)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create 2 positions in screenspace using the cursor position. 0 is asDi2015NewLine        // close as possible to the camera, 1 is as far away as possible.Di2015NewLine        Vector3 nearSource = new Vector3(mousePosition, 0f);Di2015NewLine        Vector3 farSource = new Vector3(mousePosition, 1f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use Viewport.Unproject to tell what those two screen space positionsDi2015NewLine        // would be in world space. we'll need the projection matrix and viewDi2015NewLine        // matrix, which we have saved as member variables. We also need a worldDi2015NewLine        // matrix, which can just be identity.Di2015NewLine        Vector3 nearPoint = GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Unproject(nearSource,Di2015NewLine            projectionMatrix, viewMatrix, Matrix.Identity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector3 farPoint = GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Unproject(farSource,Di2015NewLine            projectionMatrix, viewMatrix, Matrix.Identity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // find the direction vector that goes from the nearPoint to the farPointDi2015NewLine        // and normalize it....Di2015NewLine        Vector3 direction = farPoint - nearPoint;Di2015NewLine        direction.Normalize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // and then create a new ray using nearPoint as the source.Di2015NewLine        return new Ray(nearPoint, direction);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Vector3 cursorRayToCoords(Ray ray, Vector3 cameraPos)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Nullable<float> distance = ray.Intersects(new Plane(Vector3.Up, 0.0f));Di2015NewLine        if (distance == null)Di2015NewLine            return Vector3.Zero;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return cameraPos + ray.Direction * (float)distance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cursorRay = CalculateCursorRay(camera.Projection, camera.View);Di2015NewLine        cursorOnMapPos = cursorRayToCoords(cursorRay, cursorRay.Position);Di2015NewLine        checkInput(gameTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.Update(gameTime);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns the nearest unit to the cursorDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The unit nearest to the cursor</returns>Di2015NewLine    private Unit getCursorUnit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Unit closestUnit = null;Di2015NewLine        float? nearestDistance = null;Di2015NewLine        float? checkIntersect = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Unit unit in map.Units)//checks to see if unit selectionDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            checkIntersect = cursorRay.Intersects(unit.BoundingSphere);Di2015NewLine            if (checkIntersect != null)//if intersection detectedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (nearestDistance == null) //first unit foundDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    closestUnit = unit;Di2015NewLine                    nearestDistance = (float)checkIntersect;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if ((float)checkIntersect < (float)nearestDistance)//for any others, only find the nearestDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    closestUnit = unit;Di2015NewLine                    nearestDistance = (float)checkIntersect;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return closestUnit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14627429Di2015UniqueSeparator   using System;Di2015NewLine   using System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MyClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string [] strs = Di2015NewLine        {       Di2015NewLine               "Some random Name 2 - Ep.1",Di2015NewLine               "Some random Name - Ep.1",Di2015NewLine               "Boff another 2 name! - Ep. 228",Di2015NewLine               "Another one & the rest - T1 Ep. 2",Di2015NewLine               "T5 - Ep. 2 Another Name",Di2015NewLine               "T3 - Ep. 3 - One More with an Hyfen",Di2015NewLine               @"Another one this time with a Date - 02/12/2012",Di2015NewLine               "10 Aug 2012 - Some Other 2 - Ep. 2",Di2015NewLine               "Ep. 93 -  Some program name",Di2015NewLine               "Someother random name - Epis. 1 e 2",Di2015NewLine               "The Last one with something inside parenthesis (V.O.)"};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string [] regexes = Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            @"T\\d+",Di2015NewLine            @"\\-",Di2015NewLine            @"Ep(i(s(o(d(e)?)?)?)?)?\\s*\\.?\\s*\\d+(\\s*e\\s*\\d+)*",Di2015NewLine            @"\\d{2}\\/\\d{2}\\/\\d{2,4}",Di2015NewLine            @"\\d{2}\\s*[A-Z]{3}\\s*\\d{4}",Di2015NewLine            @"T\\d+",Di2015NewLine            @"\\-",Di2015NewLine            @"\\!",Di2015NewLine            @"\\(.+\\)",Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach(var str in strs)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string cleaned = str.Trim();Di2015NewLine                foreach(var cleaner in regexes)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cleaned = Regex.Replace(cleaned, "^" + cleaner, string.Empty, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase).Trim();  Di2015NewLine                    cleaned = Regex.Replace(cleaned, cleaner + "$", string.Empty, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase).Trim();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(cleaned);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

14629714Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Update the textbox text with the value that is in the VM.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    void ViewModel_PropertyChanged(object sender, System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This textbox only cares about the property it is bound toDi2015NewLine        if (e.PropertyName != MyViewModel.ValueStrPropertyName)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // "this" here refers to the actual textbox since I'm in a custom controlDi2015NewLine        //  that derives from TextBoxDi2015NewLine        BindingExpression bindingExp = this.GetBindingExpression(TextBox.TextProperty);Di2015NewLine        // the version that the ViewModel has (a potentially modified version of the user's string)Di2015NewLine        String viewModelValueStr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        viewModelValueStr = (bindingExp.DataItem as MyViewModel).ValueStr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (viewModelValueStr != this.Text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Store the user's old caret position (relative to the end of the str) so we can restore itDi2015NewLine            //  after updating the text from the ViewModel's corresponding property.Di2015NewLine            int oldCaretFromEnd = this.Text.Length - this.CaretIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Make the TextBox's Text get the updated value from the ViewModelDi2015NewLine            this.GetBindingExpression(TextBox.TextProperty).UpdateTarget();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Restore the user's caret index (relative to the end of the str)Di2015NewLine            this.CaretIndex = this.Text.Length - oldCaretFromEnd;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14630968Di2015UniqueSeparatorThen
14630968Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task Then(this Task first, Func<Task> next)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<object>();Di2015NewLine  first.ContinueWith(_ =>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (first.IsFaulted) tcs.TrySetException(first.Exception.InnerExceptions);Di2015NewLine    else if (first.IsCanceled) tcs.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        next().ContinueWith(__ =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          if (t.IsFaulted) tcs.TrySetException(t.Exception.InnerExceptions);Di2015NewLine          else if (t.IsCanceled) tcs.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine          else tcs.TrySetResult(null);Di2015NewLine        }, TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (Exception exc) { tcs.TrySetException(exc); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }, TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine  return tcs.Task; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14630968Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar task = FooAsync().Then(() => BarAsync()).Then(() => FubarAsync());Di2015NewLinetask.ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (t.IsFaulted || t.IsCanceled)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var e = t.Exception.InnerException;Di2015NewLine    // exception handlingDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("All done");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}, TaskContinuationOptions.ExcecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine

14631061Di2015UniqueSeparator private Dictionary<object[], object> Items = new Dictionary<object[], object>(new ObjectArrayComparer());Di2015NewLine
14631061Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ObjectArrayComparer : IEqualityComparer<object[]>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Determines whether x and y are equal or notDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(object[] x, object[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return object.ReferenceEquals(x, y) // Returns true if they are the same array instanceDi2015NewLine            || (x != null && y != null && x.SequenceEqual(y));  // Returns true if x and y are not null and have the same elements (order dependent)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Function that allow to fastly determine if an element is in a set of not.        Di2015NewLine    // This function must have the following property:Di2015NewLine    //   x.Equals(y) implies GetHashCode(x) == GetHashCode(y)Di2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(object[] obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Unchecked sum of the Hash Codes of all elements in objDi2015NewLine        return unchecked(obj.Select(o => o != null ? o.GetHashCode() : 0).Aggregate(0, (a, b) => a + b));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14631061Di2015UniqueSeparatorb

14633371Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ContainsAnyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly MethodInfo StringContains Di2015NewLine       = typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains", new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Builder<T> Words<T>(IEnumerable<string> words)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Builder<T>(words);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Builder<T> Words<T>(params string[] words)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Builder<T>(words);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public sealed class Builder<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly ParameterExpression Parameter Di2015NewLine           = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "obj");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly List<Expression> _properties = new List<Expression>();Di2015NewLine        private readonly List<ConstantExpression> _words;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Builder(IEnumerable<string> words)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _words = wordsDi2015NewLine                .Where(word => !string.IsNullOrEmpty(word))Di2015NewLine                .Select(word => Expression.Constant(word))Di2015NewLine                .ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Builder<T> WithProperty(Expression<Func<T, string>> property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_words.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _properties.Add(ReplacementVisitor.Transform(Di2015NewLine                    property, property.Parameters[0], Parameter));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Expression BuildProperty(Expression prop)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _wordsDi2015NewLine              .Select(w => (Expression)Expression.Call(prop, StringContains, w))Di2015NewLine              .Aggregate(Expression.OrElse);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Expression<Func<T, bool>> Build()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_words.Count == 0) return (T obj) => true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var body = _propertiesDi2015NewLine                .Select(BuildProperty)Di2015NewLine                .Aggregate(Expression.OrElse);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(body, Parameter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private sealed class ReplacementVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private ICollection<ParameterExpression> Parameters { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        private Expression Find { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        private Expression Replace { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Expression Transform(Di2015NewLine            LambdaExpression source, Di2015NewLine            Expression find, Di2015NewLine            Expression replace)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var visitor = new ReplacementVisitorDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Parameters = source.Parameters,Di2015NewLine                Find = find,Di2015NewLine                Replace = replace,Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return visitor.Visit(source.Body);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private Expression ReplaceNode(Expression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (node == Find) ? Replace : node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitConstant(ConstantExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ReplaceNode(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitBinary(BinaryExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = ReplaceNode(node);Di2015NewLine            if (result == node) result = base.VisitBinary(node);Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Parameters.Contains(node)) return ReplaceNode(node);Di2015NewLine            return Parameters.FirstOrDefault(p => p.Name == node.Name) ?? node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14633412Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void btnSort_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLine    int n = 10;Di2015NewLine    int[] iar = new int[n];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Generate random numbers and store them in the Unsorted ListBoxDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < iar.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        iar[i] = r.Next(0, 20);Di2015NewLine        lb1.Items.Add(iar[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Sort the random numbers arrayDi2015NewLine    Quicksort(iar, 0, iar.Length - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Now the array is sorted put it in the Sorted ListboxDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < iar.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lb2.Items.Add(iar[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14633412Di2015UniqueSeparator//Take an array of integers not an array of IComparableDi2015NewLinepublic static void Quicksort(int[] elements, int left, int right)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = left;Di2015NewLine    int j = right;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int pivot = elements[(left + right) / 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (i <= j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (elements[i].CompareTo(pivot) < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (elements[j].CompareTo(pivot) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            j--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (i <= j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // SwapDi2015NewLine            int tmp = elements[i];Di2015NewLine            elements[i] = elements[j];Di2015NewLine            elements[j] = tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine            j--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Recursive callsDi2015NewLine    if (left < j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Quicksort(elements, left, j);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (i < right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Quicksort(elements, i, right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       {Di2015NewLine                listView.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (ManagementObject mObject in moCollection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                listView.Items.AddRange(itemsList.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception) { }Di2015NewLine 14634260Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void SavePersons(IList<Person> persons)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a EF ContextDi2015NewLine        using (var ctx = new MyDbEntities())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // IterateDi2015NewLine            foreach (var person in persons)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get current keywordsDi2015NewLine                var keywords = new List<Keyword>(person.Keywords).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Fetch Person from DB (if its not a NEW entry). Must use Include, else it's not working.Di2015NewLine                var newPerson = ctx.PersonsDi2015NewLine                                       .Include("Keywords")Di2015NewLine                                       .FirstOrDefault(s => s.Id == person.Id) ?? person;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Clear keywords of the object, else EF will INSERT them.. Silly.Di2015NewLine                newPerson.Keywords.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Insert or update?Di2015NewLine                ctx.Entry(newPerson).State = newPerson.Id == 0 ? EntityState.Added : EntityState.Modified;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Apply new scalar valuesDi2015NewLine                if(newPerson.Id != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    person.Id = newPerson.Id;Di2015NewLine                    ctx.Entry(newPerson).CurrentValues.SetValues(person);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Iterate through all keywordsDi2015NewLine                foreach (var kw in ctx.Keywords)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If the current kw exists in OUR list, add itDi2015NewLine                    // - if not, remove the relation from the DB.Di2015NewLine                    if (keywords.Any(k => k.Id == kw.Id))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //ctx.Entry(kw).State = EntityState.Unchanged;Di2015NewLine                        ctx.Keywords.Attach(kw);Di2015NewLine                        newPerson.Keywords.Add(kw);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        newPerson.Keywords.Remove(kw);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // SaveDi2015NewLine            ctx.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14636698Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StringToDateTimeConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ((DateTime)value).ToString(parameter as string, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(value as string))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DateTime dt = DateTime.ParseExact(value as string, parameter as string, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine            return dt as DateTime?;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(i=1; n){ (v[i] - k)^2 }Di2015NewLine
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(i=1..n){v[i]^2 -2*v[i]*k + k^2}Di2015NewLine
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(i=1..n){v[i]^2 -2*v[i]*k} + k^2*nDi2015NewLine
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(i=1..n){v[i]^2} + SUM(i=1..n){-2*v[i]*k} + k^2*nDi2015NewLine
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(i=1..n){v[i]^2} + SUM(i=1..n){-2*v[i]}*k + k^2*nDi2015NewLine
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatork^2*n
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorperiod
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(-2*v[i]) * k
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(v[i]) = total = k*n
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparator-2 * k * k * nDi2015NewLine
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparator-2*k^2*n
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorn
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(i=1..n){v[i]^2} - n*k^2Di2015NewLine
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorSUM(i=1..n){values[i]^2} - period*(average^2)Di2015NewLine
14637676Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void AddBollingerBands(ref SortedList<DateTime, Dictionary<string, double>> data, int period, int factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double total_average = 0;Di2015NewLine    double total_squares = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < data.Count(); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        total_average += data.Values[i]["close"];Di2015NewLine        total_squares += Math.Pow(data.Values[i]["close"], 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (i >= period - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double total_bollinger = 0;Di2015NewLine            double average = total_average / period;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double stdev = Math.Sqrt((total_squares - Math.Pow(total_average,2)/period) / period);Di2015NewLine            data.Values[i]["bollinger_average"] = average;Di2015NewLine            data.Values[i]["bollinger_top"] = average + factor * stdev;Di2015NewLine            data.Values[i]["bollinger_bottom"] = average - factor * stdev;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            total_average -= data.Values[i - period + 1]["close"];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14639590Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TResult> Zip<TFirst, TSecond, TThird, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TFirst> first,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TSecond> second,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<TThird> third,Di2015NewLine    Func<TFirst, TSecond, TThird, TResult> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var enum1 = first.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (var enum2 = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (var enum3 = third.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (enum1.MoveNext() && enum2.MoveNext() && enum3.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return resultSelector(Di2015NewLine                enum1.Current,Di2015NewLine                enum2.Current,Di2015NewLine                enum3.Current);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14640731Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT u.task_code, u.task_name, MAX(u.cand_num)Di2015NewLine  FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.task_code, a.task_name, 0 AS cand_numDi2015NewLine          FROM rmtask aDi2015NewLine          JOIN rmtaskstate b ON a.task_code = b.task_codeDi2015NewLine          JOIN rmstateuser c ON b.state_code = c.state_codeDi2015NewLine         WHERE (c.emp_num = al_emp_num)Di2015NewLine           AND (al_new_flag = 0 OR (al_new_flag = 1 AND b.new_flag = 1))Di2015NewLine        UNIONDi2015NewLine        SELECT DISTINCT a.task_code, a.task_name, cand.emp_numDi2015NewLine          FROM rmtask aDi2015NewLine          JOIN rmtaskstate b ON a.task_code = b.task_codeDi2015NewLine          JOIN rmstateuser c ON b.state_code = c.state_codeDi2015NewLine          JOIN rmcandidate cand ON c.emp_num = cand.emp_numDi2015NewLine         WHERE (al_new_flag = 0 OR (al_new_flag = 1 AND b.new_flag = 1))Di2015NewLine           AND (cand.task_code = b.task_code)Di2015NewLine           AND (cand.emp_num_candidate = al_emp_num)Di2015NewLine           AND (cand.from_date <= DATE(CURRENT))Di2015NewLine           AND (cand.to_date >= DATE(CURRENT) OR cand.to_date IS NULL)Di2015NewLine       ) AS uDi2015NewLine GROUP BY u.task_code, u.task_name;Di2015NewLine

14643584Di2015UniqueSeparator  private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myGroupBox myGroupBox = new myGroupBox();Di2015NewLine        myGroupBox.Text = "GroupBox1";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.Controls.Add(myGroupBox);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static GraphicsPath CreatePath(float x, float y, float width, float height,Di2015NewLine                                  float radius, bool RoundTopLeft, bool RoundTopRight, bool RoundBottomRight, bool RoundBottomLeft)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float xw = x + width;Di2015NewLine        float yh = y + height;Di2015NewLine        float xwr = xw - radius;Di2015NewLine        float yhr = yh - radius;Di2015NewLine        float xr = x + radius;Di2015NewLine        float yr = y + radius;Di2015NewLine        float r2 = radius * 2;Di2015NewLine        float xwr2 = xw - r2;Di2015NewLine        float yhr2 = yh - r2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GraphicsPath p = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine        p.StartFigure();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Top Left CornerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (RoundTopLeft)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.AddArc(x, y, r2, r2, 180, 90);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.AddLine(x, yr, x, y);Di2015NewLine            p.AddLine(x, y, xr, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Top EdgeDi2015NewLine        p.AddLine(xr, y, xwr, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Top Right CornerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (RoundTopRight)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.AddArc(xwr2, y, r2, r2, 270, 90);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.AddLine(xwr, y, xw, y);Di2015NewLine            p.AddLine(xw, y, xw, yr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Right EdgeDi2015NewLine        p.AddLine(xw, yr, xw, yhr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Bottom Right CornerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (RoundBottomRight)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.AddArc(xwr2, yhr2, r2, r2, 0, 90);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.AddLine(xw, yhr, xw, yh);Di2015NewLine            p.AddLine(xw, yh, xwr, yh);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Bottom EdgeDi2015NewLine        p.AddLine(xwr, yh, xr, yh);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Bottom Left Corner           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (RoundBottomLeft)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.AddArc(x, yhr2, r2, r2, 90, 90);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.AddLine(xr, yh, x, yh);Di2015NewLine            p.AddLine(x, yh, x, yhr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Left EdgeDi2015NewLine        p.AddLine(x, yhr, x, yr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p.CloseFigure();Di2015NewLine        return p;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class myGroupBox : GroupBoxDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public myGroupBox()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.BackColor = Color.Transparent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        [Browsable(false)]Di2015NewLine        public override Color BackColorDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 14648138Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Count(IEnumerable sequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Shortcut for any ICollection implementationDi2015NewLine    var collection = sequence as ICollection;Di2015NewLine    if (collection != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return collection.Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var iterator = sequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IDisposable disposable = iterator as IDisposable;Di2015NewLine        if (disposable != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            disposable.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14648880Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpressionContext context = new ExpressionContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Tell FLEE to expect a DateTime result; if the expression evaluates otherwise, Di2015NewLine//throws an ExpressionCompileException when compiling the expressionDi2015NewLinecontext.Options.ResultType = typeof(DateTime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Instruct FLEE to expose the `DateTime` static members and have Di2015NewLine//them accessible via "DateTime".Di2015NewLine//This mimics the same exact C# syntax to access `DateTime.Now`Di2015NewLinecontext.Imports.AddType(typeof(DateTime), "DateTime");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Parse the expression, naturally the string would come from your data sourceDi2015NewLineIDynamicExpression expression = ExpressionFactory.CreateDynamic("DateTime.Now.AddDays(-7)", context);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//I believe there's a syntax in full C# that lets you evaluate this Di2015NewLine//with a generic flag, but in this build, I only have it return type Di2015NewLine//`Object` so we cast (it does return a `DateTime` though)Di2015NewLineDateTime date = (DateTime)expression.Evaluate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(date); //January 25th (7 days ago for me!)Di2015NewLine

14649583Di2015UniqueSeparatorDbContext
14649583Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetMyEntity(int myEntityId, DbContext context)
14649583Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic MyEntity GetMyEntity(int entityId, MyContext context)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MyEntity entity;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get entity from context if it's already loaded.Di2015NewLine    entity = context.Set<MyEntity>().Loaded.SingleOrDefault(q => q.EntityId == entityId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (entity != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return entity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (this.cache.TryGetValue("MYENTITY#" + entityId.ToString(), out entity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get entity from cache if it's present.  Adapt this to whatever cache API you're using.Di2015NewLine        context.Entry(entity).EntityState = EntityState.Unchanged;Di2015NewLine        return entity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Load entity if it's not in the context already or in the cache.Di2015NewLine        entity = context.Set<MyEntity>().Find(entityId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add loaded entity to the cache.  Adapt this to specify suitable rules for cache item expiry if appropriate.Di2015NewLine        this.cache["MYENTITY#" + entityId.ToString()] = entity;Di2015NewLine        return entity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14653909Di2015UniqueSeparator// Generic DragEnterDi2015NewLineprivate void ddEnter_DragEnter(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    e.Effect =
