EventsDi2015NewLineprivate void builderAndFields_DragDrop(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ListViewItem i = new ListViewItem();Di2015NewLine    i = e.Data.GetData(typeof(ListViewItem)) as ListViewItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Since this function works for both the builder and the fields,Di2015NewLine    // we have to check to see where we are dropping, the senderDi2015NewLine    // is the ListView we are dropping ontoDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(sender.Equals(packetBuilder));Di2015NewLine    if (sender.Equals(packetBuilder))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ListViewItem c = new ListViewItem();Di2015NewLine        c = (ListViewItem)i.Clone();Di2015NewLine        Point cp = packetBuilder.PointToClient(new Point(e.X, e.Y));Di2015NewLine        // Now, we have to check to see if we are reordering or addingDi2015NewLine        // So, we check the flag to see if the dragDrop was initiated Di2015NewLine        // on the builder or on the fields ListViewDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(fromBuilder);Di2015NewLine        if (fromBuilder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (packetBuilder.HitTest(cp).Location.ToString() == "None")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                packetBuilder.Items.Add(c);Di2015NewLine                packetBuilder.Items.Remove(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ListViewItem dragToItem = packetBuilder.GetItemAt(cp.X, cp.Y);Di2015NewLine                int dropIndex = dragToItem.Index;Di2015NewLine                packetBuilder.Items.Insert(dropIndex, c);Di2015NewLine                packetBuilder.Items.Remove(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (packetBuilder.HitTest(cp).Location.ToString() == "None")Di2015NewLine                packetBuilder.Items.Add(c);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ListViewItem dragToItem = packetBuilder.GetItemAt(cp.X, cp.Y);Di2015NewLine                int dropIndex = dragToItem.Index;Di2015NewLine                packetBuilder.Items.Insert(dropIndex, c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // If the sender is the fields listView, the user is trying to removeDi2015NewLine    // the item from the builder.Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        packetBuilder.Items.Remove(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

listView1.Items.Add(item.PlugInTitle, imageIndex);Di2015NewLine            imageIndex++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        listView1.MouseDoubleClick += new MouseEventHandler(listView1_MouseDoubleClick);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void listView1_MouseDoubleClick(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the Plug-In index number Di2015NewLine        int plugInNum = listView1.SelectedItems[0].Index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PlugInInfo selectedPlugIn = AvailablePlugIns[plugInNum];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Call the StartPlugIn method in the selected Plug-In.Di2015NewLine        // Lazy Instantiation will fully load the Assembly hereDi2015NewLine        selectedPlugIn.PlugIn.StartPlugIn(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Plug-In Title:          {0}", selectedPlugIn.PlugInTitle);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Plug-In Description:    {0}", selectedPlugIn.PlugInDescription);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Plug-In Version:        {0}", selectedPlugIn.PlugInVersion);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<PlugInInfo> GetPlugInList()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a List to hold the info for each plug-inDi2015NewLine        List<PlugInInfo> plugInList = new List<PlugInInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set Plug-In folder path to same directory level as SolutionDi2015NewLine        string plugInFolderPath = System.IO.Path.Combine(Application.StartupPath, @"..\\..\\..\\Plug-Ins");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Test if the Plug-In folder existsDi2015NewLine        if (!Directory.Exists(plugInFolderPath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Plug-In Folder is missing, so try to create itDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            { Directory.CreateDirectory(plugInFolderPath); }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            { MessageBox.Show("Failed to create Plug-In folder", "Folder Creation Error:", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Exclamation); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create a catalog of plug-insDi2015NewLine            var catalog = new DirectoryCatalog(plugInFolderPath, "*.dll");Di2015NewLine            AggregateCatalog plugInCatalog = new AggregateCatalog();Di2015NewLine            plugInCatalog.Catalogs.Add(catalog);Di2015NewLine            CompositionContainer container = new CompositionContainer(plugInCatalog);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This line will fetch the metadata from each plug-in and populate LoadedPlugInsDi2015NewLine            container.ComposeParts(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save each Plug-Ins metadataDi2015NewLine            foreach (var plugin in LoadedPlugIns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PlugInInfo info = new PlugInInfo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                info.PlugInTitle = plugin.Metadata.PlugInTitle;Di2015NewLine                info.PlugInDescription = plugin.Metadata.PlugInDescription;Di2015NewLine                info.PlugInVersion = plugin.Metadata.PlugInVersion;Di2015NewLine                info.PlugIn = plugin.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                plugInList.Add(info);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int index = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Extract icons from each Plug-In DLL and store in Plug-In listDi2015NewLine            foreach (var filePath in catalog.LoadedFiles)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                plugInList[index].PlugInIcon = Icon.ExtractAssociatedIcon(filePath);Di2015NewLine                index++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (FileNotFoundException fex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("File not found exception : " + fex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (CompositionException cex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Composition exception : " + cex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (DirectoryNotFoundException dex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Directory not found exception : " + dex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return plugInList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PlugInInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string PlugInTitle { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string PlugInDescription { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string PlugInVersion { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Icon PlugInIcon { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public IPlugIn PlugIn { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14658155Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring input = "?where[column]=value&where[column2]=value2&orderby[column]=asc&orderby[column2]=desc";Di2015NewLinestring pattern = @"(?<Type>[^[]+)\\[(?<Key>[^]]+)\\]=(?<Value>.+)";Di2015NewLinevar re = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLinevar dict = input.Split(new[] { "?", "&" }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries)Di2015NewLine                .Select(s => re.Match(s))Di2015NewLine                .GroupBy(m => m.Groups["Type"].Value)Di2015NewLine                .ToDictionary(g => g.Key,Di2015NewLine                    g => g.ToDictionary(x => x.Groups["Key"].Value,Di2015NewLine                                        x => x.Groups["Value"].Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var t in dict.Keys)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Type: " + t);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var k in dict[t].Keys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", k, dict[t][k]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14658170Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid AddEvents(System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection Controls)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (Control c in Controls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (c is GroupBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AddEvents(((GroupBox)c).Controls);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (c is Panel)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AddEvents(((Panel)c).Controls);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Expand this series of if...else... to include any Di2015NewLine        //other type of container controlDi2015NewLine        else if (c is TextBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((TextBox)c).TextChanged += new EventHandler(MyHandler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (c is RichTextBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((RichTextBox)c).TextChanged += new EventHandler(MyHandler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (c is CheckBox)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((CheckBox)c).CheckedChanged += new EventHandler(MyHandler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (c is DateTimePicker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((DateTimePicker)c).ValueChanged += new EventHandler(MyHandler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Expand this to include any other type of controls your form Di2015NewLine        //has that you need to add the event toDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14659559Di2015UniqueSeparatorMillisecondsToDuration
14659559Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction MillisecondsToDuration(n) {Di2015NewLine    var dtm = new Date();Di2015NewLine    dtm.setTime(n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var hours = Math.floor(n / 3600000);Di2015NewLine    var minutes = dtm.getMinutes();Di2015NewLine    var seconds = dtm.getSeconds();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return $.jqplot.sprintf('%02d:%02d:%02d', hours, minutes, seconds);        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14662334Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void DirSearch(string sDir, FtpConnection ftp)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     // First, copy all files in the current directoryDi2015NewLine     foreach (string f in Directory.GetFiles(d))Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine       Uri uri = new Uri(f);            Di2015NewLine       ftp.PutFile(f, System.IO.Path.GetFileName(uri.LocalPath));Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For all directories in the current directory, create directory if there isDi2015NewLine    // no such, and call this function recursively to copy files.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string d in Directory.GetDirectories(sDir))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string dirname = new DirectoryInfo(d).Name;Di2015NewLine      if (!ftp.DirectoryExists(dirname))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        ftp.CreateDirectory(dirname);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      ftp.SetCurrentDirectory(dirname);Di2015NewLine      DirSearch(d, ftp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  catch (System.Exception e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show(String.Format("Bd FTP: {0} {1}", e.Message), "Bd wysyania plikw na FTP", MessageBoxButton.OK, MessageBoxImage.Error);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  finally{Di2015NewLine     // Go back! 14663267Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IncludesTypeWithSpecificExportMetadata<T>(string assemblyPath, string name, T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AssemblyDefinition assemblyDefinition = AssemblyDefinition.ReadAssembly(assemblyPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool typeWasFound = false;          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (TypeDefinition typeDefinition in assemblyDefinition.MainModule.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (CustomAttribute customAttribute in typeDefinition.CustomAttributes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (customAttribute.AttributeType.FullName == typeof(ExportMetadataAttribute).FullName)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string actualName = (string)customAttribute.ConstructorArguments[0].Value;Di2015NewLine                    T actualValue = (T)((CustomAttributeArgument)customAttribute.ConstructorArguments[1].Value).Value;Di2015NewLine                    if (actualName.Equals(name) && actualValue.Equals(value))                        Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        typeWasFound = true;                       Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return typeWasFound;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

sorters[0];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < sorters.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var func1 = comparisonB;Di2015NewLine            var func2 = cmp;Di2015NewLine                    return func2(a, b);Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var comparisonC = new return cmp;Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine            var data = CreateSortData();Di2015NewLine            var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine            Array.Sort(data, comparisonA);Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine
